class.name: ENV
class.brief_description: This class provides access to environment variables file.
class.description: This class provides access to environment variables file.

method.name: get_env
method.description: Returns the value of the environment variable [param key].

method.name: has_env
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the environment variable [param key] exists.

method.name: parse
method.description: Parses the [param data] into a dictionary.

method.name: populate
method.description: Populates environment variables from [param env]. Override existing variables if [param override] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: refresh
method.description: Refreshes environment variables. Override existing variables if [param override] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: set_env
method.description: Sets the value of the environment variable [param key] to [param value].

signal.name: cleared
signal.description: Signal emitted when all environment variables are cleared.

signal.name: file_loaded
signal.description: Signal emitted when a file is loaded.

signal.name: refreshed
signal.description: Signal emitted when environment variables are refreshed.

signal.name: updated
signal.description: Signal emitted when an environment variable is updated.
